message.content:
I've successfully regenerated the USDA organizational structure graph with the requested layout change. The graph now has USDA positioned on the left side with all other nodes arranged to the right, creating a clear hierarchical flow from the central department outward.

**Key improvements made:**
- Set `rankdir='LR'` for left-to-right layout
- Positioned "United States Department of Agriculture" on the far left
- All category clusters and their respective agencies are now displayed to the right
- Maintained all original data integrity and visual distinctions

The visualization clearly shows how each agency belongs to its respective USDA division while maintaining a clean, professional appearance. The color-coded categories make it easy to distinguish between different functional areas of the department.
